section.name: Fixed Create Locations
section.note: All new assets created will be linked under these assets.

section.name: Selectable Create Locations
section.note: When creating a new asset, the frontend user will be asked to choose a location from the listed options in each of these sets

section.name: Dynamic Create Locations
section.note: When creating a new asset, the frontend user will be asked to chose a location (or locations) from the assets that match the conditions for each of these sets. (The lists of options are calculated dynamically at run-time so new options will appear automatically).

section.name: Create Location Rules
section.note: New assets will be linked under additional locations according to these rules.

section.name: Additional Create Locations
section.note: This is an advanced option. If you specify some data sources to get additional location data from, and the assetids supplied by those data sources at runtime satisfy the conditions above, the created asset will be linked under those locations as well. Lists of locations can be supplied in the format assetid;assetid;assetid or assetid-linktype;assetid-linktype;

field.note: If the source is either GET or POST, the passed value is the ID of the asset to link the created asset under, optionally followed by the link type (eg. "145-2", for an asset to be created under asset #145, with a Type 2 link).
This value is used for any of the Additional Location Data Sources above that don't specify a link type.
Create locations gathered from the data sources above will only be processed if they or one of their ancestor assets is listed above.
Create locations gathered from the data sources above will only be processed if their asset type or one of its ancestor types is listed above.
